products.name: Apple MacBook Pro 14 (M3 Pro)
products.description: Professional-grade MacBook Pro with M3 Pro chip featuring 12-core CPU and 18-core GPU, stunning Liquid Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology, and industry-leading battery life for creative professionals.

products.name: Dell XPS 15 (9520)
products.description: Premium Windows laptop featuring 14-core Intel processor, 4K InfinityEdge touch display with 100% AdobeRGB coverage, and professional-grade CNC machined aluminum chassis with carbon fiber palm rest.

products.name: Asus ROG Zephyrus G14
products.description: Ultra-portable gaming laptop featuring AMD Ryzen 9 processor and RTX 4060 GPU with 100W TGP, 165Hz QHD display with 3ms response time, and innovative AniMe Matrix LED lid display in a compact 14-inch magnesium alloy chassis.

products.name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10
products.description: Legendary business ultrabook featuring military-grade durability, best-in-class keyboard with 1.5mm travel, and Intel Evo certification for premium performance and responsiveness in a lightweight carbon fiber chassis.

products.name: HP Spectre x360 14
products.description: Premium 2-in-1 convertible laptop with stunning OLED touch display featuring 100% DCI-P3 color gamut, gem-cut aluminum design with angular edges, and included HP Rechargeable MPP2.0 Tilt Pen for creative work.

products.name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 5
products.description: Sleek and minimalist Windows laptop with premium build quality, optimized for Windows 11 with PixelSense touch display in 3:2 aspect ratio, featuring Alcantara fabric-covered keyboard deck for premium feel.

products.name: Acer Swift X SFX14-41G
products.description: Affordable performance laptop combining 8-core AMD Ryzen processor with RTX 3050 Ti graphics in a portable 14-inch chassis, offering excellent value for content creators and moderate gamers.

products.name: Razer Blade 15
products.description: Premium gaming laptop with CNC aluminum chassis, QHD 240Hz display with 2ms response time, and powerful RTX 3070 Ti graphics, featuring Razer Chroma RGB lighting and advanced vapor chamber cooling.

products.name: LG Gram 17
products.description: Incredibly lightweight 17-inch laptop weighing just 1.35kg with exceptional battery life, featuring a spacious 16:10 aspect ratio display and military-grade durability for productivity on the go.

products.name: MSI Stealth GS77
products.description: Ultra-powerful 17-inch gaming laptop with 4K 120Hz display, desktop-grade Intel Core i9 processor and RTX 3080 Ti graphics, featuring advanced cooling system with 3 fans and 6 heat pipes in a relatively slim chassis.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Book3 Ultra
products.description: Premium ultrabook with stunning Dynamic AMOLED 2X display featuring 120Hz refresh rate and 500 nits brightness, powerful Intel Core i7 processor and RTX graphics, with deep integration with Samsung Galaxy ecosystem.

products.name: Framework Laptop 13
products.description: Innovative modular laptop designed for repairability and upgradability, featuring swappable port modules and easy access to internal components, with 3:2 aspect ratio display and 100% sRGB color coverage.

products.name: Alienware x14 R2
products.description: Ultra-thin 14-inch gaming laptop featuring powerful RTX 4060 graphics in just 14.5mm chassis, with premium magnesium alloy construction, advanced cooling solution, and Alienware's Legend 2.0 design language.

products.name: HP Omen 16
products.description: Powerful 16-inch gaming laptop featuring AMD Ryzen 7 processor and RTX 4060 graphics with 115W TGP, 165Hz refresh rate display, and Omen Tempest Cooling technology for sustained performance.

products.name: Asus TUF Gaming A15
products.description: Durable budget gaming laptop featuring AMD Ryzen 7 processor and RTX 4050 graphics, MIL-STD-810H military standard durability, and 144Hz refresh rate display in a value-oriented package.

products.name: Dell Inspiron 16 Plus
products.description: 16-inch creator laptop featuring 3K resolution display, Intel Core i7 processor and RTX 3050 graphics, offering excellent performance for content creation at a reasonable price point.

products.name: MSI Prestige 14 Evo
products.description: Intel Evo certified business ultrabook featuring 16:10 QHD+ display, premium aluminum chassis, and all-day battery life with fast charging capability.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Book2 Pro 360
products.description: Premium convertible laptop with stunning Super AMOLED touch display, included S Pen with 4096 pressure levels, and ultra-thin 11.9mm design with 360-degree hinge for multiple usage modes.

products.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 7 Carbon
products.description: Extremely lightweight 14-inch ultrabook with 2.8K OLED display, magnesium and carbon fiber construction weighing just 1.1kg, featuring AMD Ryzen 7 processor with RDNA 2 graphics.

products.name: HP Pavilion Plus 14
products.description: Affordable 14-inch ultrabook with 2.2K resolution display, Intel Core i5 processor, and lightweight design, offering excellent value for students and professionals.

products.name: Asus Vivobook Pro 16X OLED
products.description: Content creation laptop featuring 4K OLED display with 100% DCI-P3 coverage, powerful AMD Ryzen 9 processor and RTX 3060 graphics, optimized for creative professionals.

products.name: Acer Chromebook Spin 714
products.description: Premium Chromebook convertible with 360-degree hinge, included USI stylus, and Intel Core i5 processor, offering excellent performance for education and business use.

products.name: Dell Precision 5470
products.description: Mobile workstation featuring Intel Core i7 processor and NVIDIA RTX professional graphics, ISV-certified for engineering and creative applications, in an ultra-compact 14-inch chassis.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air 15 (M2)
products.description: Thin and light 15-inch MacBook Air featuring Apple M2 chip with 8-core CPU and 10-core GPU, fanless design, and Liquid Retina display with 500 nits brightness.

products.name: Acer Predator Helios 16
products.description: Powerful 16-inch gaming laptop featuring Intel Core i7 processor and RTX 4070 graphics with 140W TGP, 240Hz QHD+ display, and advanced cooling system with 5th Gen AeroBlade fans.

products.name: Microsoft Surface Laptop Studio
products.description: Innovative convertible laptop with dynamic woven hinge that transforms between laptop, stage, and studio modes, featuring 120Hz touch display and included Slim Pen 2 for creative work.

products.name: Lenovo Legion Pro 7i
products.description: Extreme-performance gaming laptop featuring Intel Core i9 processor and RTX 4080 graphics with 175W TGP, 240Hz QHD+ display, and advanced Legion Coldfront 5.0 cooling with liquid metal thermal compound.

products.description: Durable budget gaming laptop featuring AMD Ryzen 7 processor and RTX 4050 graphics, MIL-STD-810H military standard durability, and 144Hz refresh rate display in a value-oriented package.
